name: Tarnished onE
description:
you are a Tarnished that is sentenced for a finite punishment in the Eternal Dungeon.
will you be able to escape the Dungeon?
This Game is Submitted for Black and White Game Jam (2022)

CONTROLS: KEYBOARD or GAMEPAD
( Z or B ) - Jump 
( X or A ) - Attack
( C or RT ) - Dash
( Arrows or Joystick ) - Movement

------THANKS FOR PLAYING-------
Sub to My Youtube to follow more Game Jam
